original_text: Then God said to me, ‘Son of man, I will soon take away the bread in Jerusalem. The people will have to measure the food that they eat. And they will have to measure the water that they drink. They will worry and be afraid.
korean_text: 또 내게 이르시되 인자야 내가 예루살렘에서 의뢰하는 양식을 끊으리니 백성이 근심 중에 떡을 달아 먹고 두려워 떨며 물을 되어 마시다가

sentences.original_text: I will soon take away the bread in Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 이제 예루살렘의 빵을 거두어 가겠다

sentences.original_text: The people will have to measure the food that they eat
sentences.korean_translation: 백성들이 먹는 음식을 저울로 달아야 할 것이다

sentences.original_text: And they will have to measure the water that they drink
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 마시는 물도 잼으로 재어야 할 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will worry and be afraid
